question: When is Hindi Diwas (Hindi Day) celebrated in India?
explanation:
Every year on September 14th, India celebrates “Hindi Diwas”(Hindi Day).
On Sep 14, 1949 Hindi became the official language of the nation. This decision was ratified by the Constitution on January 26, 1950. Hindi written in the Devanagari script has been adopted as the official language Under Article 343 of the Indian Constitution.
